channel.title: Comments on: Utilizing SQL Server Reports from SSMS
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Koen Verbeeck
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.content:encoded:
Nice tip.

I use the “Disk Usage by Table” report a lot; most of the time to get a quick feeling of what database I’m working with.

SSIS 2012 also has a great range of built-in reporting.
